dialogue.prompt: Hi, I'm really worried about my sister. I recommend starting by discussing it with her primary care physician or the home health nurse during their next visit—they can assess eligibility and refer her to a palliative care team. You could also contact her Medicare plan or a local Area Agency on Aging for guidance on benefits.
